snippet: One of six men in the lobby of a Hilton Garden Inn near Kennedy International Airport shot another and then himself, and it was unclear what might have prompted the gunfire.
abstract: Two men are killed in Hilton Garden Inn near Kennedy Airport in an apparent murder-suicide in the hotel's lobby; Brian Weiss is shot and killed by Gary Zaleysky, who then took his own life; it is unclear what prompted the incident.

byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and IVAN PEREIRA

lead_paragraph: One of six men in the lobby of a Hilton Garden Inn near Kennedy International Airport shot another and then himself, and it was unclear what might have prompted the gunfire.

headline.seo: Murder-Suicide in Hotel Near Kennedy Airport
headline.main: Fatal Shooting in Hotel Lobby, Then a Suicide
headline.print_headline: Fatal Shooting In Hotel Lobby, Then a Suicide
